attributes.title: Digital analytics trends: a changing industry and what's next, with Krista Seiden
attributes.author: Guido Jansen & Bart van der Meer
attributes.summary: In this clip from our livestream during #DAC19, Guido and Bart speak with Krista Seiden from KS Digital.
attributes.description:
Krista's session at #DAC19:Digital analytics trends: a changing industry and what's next - The digital analytics industry has seen a lot of changes in recent years, both in terms of new products and ways of doing analysis, and how analysts want to use such tools and access data. In this talk, Krista will touch on the shifting trends she's seen and dig into new tools such as Google's App+Web tracking for a glimpse at what the future may look like.
 
Het Digital Analytics Congres 2019 vond plaats op 8 oktober 2019 in de Jaarbeurs in Utrecht en wij deden live verslag vanaf de conferentie. Meer over het congres kun je vinden op https://www.digitalanalyticscongres.nl/.DAC19 werd georganiseerd door het Expertise Center voor Marketing Insights, Onderzoek en Analytics beter bekend als MOA. Meer daarover kun je terugvinden op https://www.moaweb.nl/. Guest: Krista Seiden URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/krista-seiden
